# Self-Sufficient (Feat)
## Overview
You know how to get along in the wild and how to effectively treat wounds.

**Benefit**: You get a +2 bonus on all [[Heal (Spell)|Heal]] checks and [[Survival (Skill)|Survival]] checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in one of these skills, the bonus increases to +4 for that skill.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 133
